name: Police Runner
description:
Game done in a 48 hours long game jam. 

#fliperjam

Spray graffiti on walls over the streets while running away from cops. Avoid cones, garbage cans and bullets!

COMMANDS:  
Up and down arrows. Keyboard or joystick.

TEAM
Helder Sousa - Developer
Noaue Bittencourt - Game Design
Pivante - Art & Animation
Raissa Studart - Art & Animation
Super Velociraptor -  Sound Design & SFX
